previous.excerpt: How would you like to solve all the mysteries of your data in just seconds? Simply pick an AI-based Template and voila -- instant discoveries in front of you. Combine different Templates to look at your data from unlimited angles!
previous.title: Stormly 2.0 - Turn your data into insights with a single click 🤯

localize.description: 你想不想在几秒钟内解开数据的所有奥秘？只需选择一个基于人工智能的模板，瞧--瞬间发现就在你面前。结合不同的模板，从无限的角度观察您的数据!
